item.description:
Learn about instinctual subtypes and stacking, centers, parental types, sequences, any ways you move around the Enneagram types. This is essential information to learn the Enneagram in depth. We'll also cover relationship dynamics.

1-4pm

$40

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a relationship coach, psychotherapist, personal life coach and Enneagram teacher and author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram. He has worked with thousands of people using the Enneagram and has led staff and team development trainings using the Enneagram for many organizations.

 

herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: Across the street from main public parking lot in Watertown Square
item.name: Enneagram Advanced Workshop
